INTRO.TITLE: Welcome
INTRO.TEXT: To program your senseBox wirelessly, please follow these steps. We will help you connect to your senseBox via WiFi.
INTRO.STEPS: First, please make sure that your senseBox...

GO_ONLINE.TITLE: Compiling your sketch...
GO_ONLINE.TEXT: For compilation, you need to connect to the internet. Please enable a connection.

MANUAL.TITLE: Connect to your senseBox
MANUAL.TEXT: Your senseBox should have opened the a WiFi network. Because we can not do this automatically on your platform, please connect to it manually.

AUTO.TITLE: Select your senseBox
AUTO.TEXT: In the list, all running senseBoxes with OTA available are shown. If you don't see yours, please make sure that GPS is enabled.
